src:
Hujan-hujan, Luhut dan Budi Karya Rayakan Ultah Gojek di GBK
02 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Hendra Kusuma


Foto: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan dan Menteri Perhubungan Budi Karya Sumadi kompak menghadiri acara ulang tahun Gojek Indonesia yang ke-9. Meski diwarnai hujan deras, kedua menteri ini tetap menyapa para mitra driver yang sudah memadati area parkir selatan, komplek GBK.Pada saat sambutan, Luhut meminta bahwa seluruh mitra Gojek Indonesia harus tetap semangat dan disiplin dengan peraturan yang diberlakukan perusahaan."Untuk driver yang luar biasa, saya mau minta supaya tetap disiplin, membuat warna Indonesia. Kalian ini driver pejuang, pejuang untuk keluarga, kalian harus tertib," kata Luhut, Sabtu (3/11/2019).


Foto: Hendra Kusuma

Luhut juga meminta kepada manajemen Gojek Indonesia terus memperhatikan kesejahteraan seluruh mitranya, khususnya para driver. Sebab, Gojek Indonesia tidak akan tumbuh besar dan terus berkembang tanpa kerja keras mitra."Saya titip kepada manajemen Gojek supaya bekerja tetap memperhatikan drivernya. Tapi saya titip juga driver supaya kerja keras, disiplin menaati peraturan. Ingat kita menghidupi keluarga kita, kalau menghidupi keluarga kita harus disiplin," jelasnya.Setelah memberikan sambutan, Luhut dan Budi Karya pun meninggalkan area parkir selatan GBkK, Jakarta Selatan melalui pintu belakang panggung. Luhut bilang, Pemerintah akan terus memberikan dukungan kepada Gojek Indonesia yang merupakan perusahaan hasil karya anak negeri."Pemerintah akan tetap mendukung Gojek karena mengayomi rakyat kecil," ungkap dia.


Foto: Hendra Kusuma


Simak Video "Komentari Penusukan Wiranto, Luhut Pandjaitan: Jangan Dibesar-Besarkan"

(hek/eds)
text:
Rain, Luhut and Budi Karya celebrate Gojek's birthday at GBK
02 Nov 2019, 09:37 by Hendra Kusuma


Photo: Hendra Kusuma

Jakarta - The Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Binsar Pandjaitan and the Minister of Transportation Budi Karya Sumadi were compact in attending the 9th anniversary of Gojek Indonesia. Despite the heavy rain, the two ministers still greeted the driver partners who had packed the southern parking area, the GBK complex. At the time of his speech, Luhut requested that all Indonesian Gojek partners should remain enthusiastic and disciplined with the regulations imposed by the company. "For external drivers usual, I want to ask to remain disciplined, make the colors of Indonesia. You are a fighter driver, fighter for the family, you have to be orderly, "said Luhut, Saturday (3/11/2019).


Photo: Hendra Kusuma

Luhut also requested that Gojek Indonesia's management continue to pay attention to the welfare of all its partners, especially the drivers. Because, Gojek Indonesia will not grow big and continue to develop without the hard work of partners. "I entrust Gojek management to work to pay attention to the drivers. But I also entrust drivers to work hard, discipline to obey the rules. Remember we support our families, if we support our families we must be disciplined, "he explained. After giving his speech, Luhut and Budi Karya left the parking area south of GBkK, South Jakarta through the backstage door. Luhut said, the Government will continue to provide support to Gojek Indonesia, which is a company created by the children of the country. "The government will continue to support Gojek because it protects the small people," he said.


Photo: Hendra Kusuma


Check out the video "Wiranto's Stabbing Commentary, Luhut Pandjaitan: Don't Be Exaggerated"
